Name: TNT (Tequila 'N' Tonic)
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: A simple but very tasty way to enjoy tequila.
History: Adapted from Victor Bergeron's Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (1972 revised edition).
Nutrition: One serving of TNT (Tequila 'N' Tonic) contains 99 calories
